column5: Home Depot SCAM -  Be Careful - A 'heads up' for those men who may be regular Home De p o.t customers. Over the last month I became a victim of a clever scam while out shopping. Simply going out to get supplies has turned out to be quite traumatic. Don't be naive enough to think it couldn't happen to you or your friends.  Here's how the scam works: Two very hot 20-21 year-old girls come over to your car as you are packing your shopping into the trunk. They both start wiping your windshield with a rag and Windex, with their breasts almost falling out of their skimpy T-shirts. It is impossible not to look. When you thank them and offer them a tip, they say 'No' and instead ask you for a ride to another Home Depot. You agree and they get in the backseat. On the way, they start undressing. Then one of them climbs over into the front seat and starts crawling all over you, while the other one steals your wallet. I had my wallet stolen March 4th, 9th, 10th, twice on the 15th, 17th, 20th & 24th. Also April 1st, 4th, twice on the 8th, 16th, 23rd, 24th, three times last Saturday and very likely again this upcoming weekend.  So tell your friends to be careful.
SHHHHHH.......don't tell anyone!!!
man you too they did it to me again today and tomorrow if i'm lucky lol
that's why you buy a wallet from the $1 store so you can go again and again for only a few bucks!
HAHAHAHA! OMG! That definitely just made my day! TOO FUNNY!!!
haha indeed! :P  Where may this Home Depot be at? haha
Which depot did ya say?
20-21 year olds, you guys are sick. They're still children.
It must really be a drag to grow old like that eh Bubba?  You can only be young once... but you can be immature forever!!!
not for me
Off to Home Depot I go
im still kickin at 20
got me again, this time I was smart and took a pic
Their still fair game for me as I'm 20.

I got this joke as an email on March 4th, 9th, 10th, twice on the 15th, 17th, 20th & 24th. Also April 1st, 4th, twice on the 8th, 16th, 23rd, 24th, three times last Saturday and very likely again this upcoming weekend.
